channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 20:01 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovsk territorial community. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 🟡 20:01 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovsk territorial community. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region#Покровська_териториальна_громада This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
